=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 6, col = 5)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 6, col = 5)

Since my avatar has not moved from the previous state, I need to analyze the current environment for potential threats and resources.

In the vicinity of my position (row=6, col=5), I have the following opportunities:
- There are clouds nearby (specifically at (row=6, col=12), (row=6, col=13), and (row=6, col=14)), which could be used for movement or to position myself strategically.
- A portalAmmo sprite is located at (row=6, col=30), which I can collect to replenish ammunition, vital for survival.

Given the available moves and the strategic options outlined earlier, I will opt to rotate my avatar towards the right to head in the direction of the portalAmmo.

I will perform the right directional action to get closer to the portalAmmo.

``` Action:3 ```
This action should help me align my movement towards collecting the ammunition, which is crucial for sustaining my ability to attack and survive effectively in the game.
